name: REUZEL ASTRINGENT FOAM
review: You’ve just run a razor over your face. Maybe you owe it a little something extra? Reuzel Astringent Foam is non-drying and oil-free, so it’ll give your skin the firm, smooth look you’re after without removing essential moisture.

name: REUZEL SHAVE CREAM
review: In the old days, a town’s barbers also did its bloodletting. Let’s just say that isn’t how we do things anymore. Reuzel Shave Cream is a highly concentrated formula. Our T4 Tonic Blend combos with quinoa, aloe vera and sorbitol to give you a close shave, no nicking necessary.

name: REUZEL BEARD FOAM
review: Keep your beard under control with our leave-in Reuzel Beard Foam. The same T4 Tonic Blend that makes our hair care products special will do wonders here, as well. Just a bit will reduce beardruff, tame rogue hairs, add fullness and knock out that funky beard smell.

name: REUZEL SOLID COLOGNE WOOD & SPICE
review: The Wood & Spice scent you used to but now available in a solid cologne. Direction of use: Scrape a little out with your finger nail and warm it between you fingers. Apply where desired.

name: REUZEL ‘THE STACHE’ MOUSTACHE WAX
review: Reuzel Stache Wax is a beeswax based formula that provides a firm hold with a natural finish. In honor of our old friend Kurtis “Stache” Lawrence, a portion of the proceeds from the sale of Stache Wax is used for scholarships at The Old School Barber Academy in Rotterdam.

name: REUZEL BEARD FOAM WOOD & SPICE
review: Reuzel Wood & Spice Beard Foam features a brand-new fragrance that’s a bit of a slap in the face. (And who doesn’t like that?) Massage it in, and you’ll find it controls wayward hairs and conditions the skin underneath.

name: REUZEL REFRESH NO RINSE BEARD WASH
BODY SOAP BAR
review: REUZEL® Body Bar is a hydrating cleansing bar for the entire body. REUZEL® Body Bar includes Quartz for natural exfoliation, and the essence of Tea Tree leaves your skin feeling refreshed, clean and hydrated. Scented with refreshing Spearmint and hints of Tea Tree.

name: REUZEL 3-IN-1 TEA TREE
review: On the go? Or maybe just trying to keep life simple? Keep Reuzel 3-in-1 Tea Tree Shampoo, Conditioner & Body Wash on hand. It’s a one-stop shop for cleaning and conditioning. It belongs in every man’s dopp kit and gym bag.

name: REUZEL DAILY SHAMPOO
review: Want to start every day fresh? Here you go, friend. Reuzel Daily Shampoo cleans without stripping. It smells great. And our T4 tonic blend of witch hazel, nettle leaf, rosemary and horsetail root extracts will leave you with a stronger, shinier head of hair.

name: REUZEL HAIR TONIC
review: Step back in time into a classic barbershop, where guys wanted to clean their scalp without stripping the grease from their hair. Reuzel Hair Tonic is just the thing. It’s a multipurpose tool with a classic masculine smell.

name: SURF TONIC
review: Just because we’re from Rotterdam doesn’t mean we don’t enjoy a little sea spray in our hair. Reuzel Surf Tonic gives a man’s style instant volume and texture, letting you create a windblown style with a messy, matte finish.

name: REUZEL GROOMING TONIC
review: Reuzel Grooming Tonic is a tool every man needs on his shelf. You need to add a little extra boost to fine hair, this is just the thing. If you use a blow dryer, it’ll protect your hair. And if you want a natural look, this tonic can stand on its own.

name: REUZEL DAILY CONDITIONER
review: Step out of the shower feeling like your scalp’s come right back to life. Reuzel Daily Conditioner does the trick with our own T4 tonic blend of witch hazel, nettle leaf, rosemary and horsetail root extracts.

name: REUZEL EXTREME HOLD MATTE POMADE
review: Want a messy, dry look that stays in place, all day long? Or do you prefer an ultra, well-groomed look? This is how you get it. Reuzel Extreme Hold Matte Pomade gives you total control, yet its water-based formula washes out with no fuss when the day is done. Magic.

name: REUZEL FIBER POMADE
review: Reuzel Fiber Pomade turns a proper porkchop into a just-out-of-bed style. It’s perfect for those times when a man wants to wear his hair a little loose but still look great.

name: REUZEL PINK GREASE HEAVY HOLD
review: Pink Reuzel is a wax and oil-based pomade, crafted to create a hold like a brick wall. It’ll give you the power to mold and hold shape all day long.

name: REUZEL RED WATER SOLUBLE HIGH SHEEN
review: Welcome to the world of shine. Reuzel Red Pomade is one of the products that put us on the map. It comes out of the can like butter. And it combs through the hair, bringing polish and class to any hairstyle.

name: REUZEL CLAY MATTE POMADE
review: Want to get flat, weak hair to stand up? Here’s your answer. Reuzel Clay Matte Pomade will get you volume, texture and height with a dry matte look. It smells amazing and washes out easy.

name: REUZEL BLUE STRONG HOLD WATER SOLUBLE HIGH SHEEN
review: Got the blues? It’s not our fault. Open up the tin. Doesn’t that smell nice? Reuzel blue is perfectly blended with a subtle warm vanilla scent. Use it to create exaggerated pompadours or to tame the most unruly hair.

name: REUZEL GREEN GREASE MEDIUM HOLD
review: Some call it the green grease. And it’s one of our staples. It’s used in barbershop classes worldwide to help stylists construct perfect pompadours and classic contours. And it makes a great cocktail with other products.

name: REUZEL GROOMING CREAM
review: Reuzel Grooming Cream provides a light hold and works well for all hair types, especially finer hair where added texture or increased definition is desired. Tames hair while leaving a los shine finis

name: REUZEL MATTE STYLING PASTE
review: Reuzel Matte Styling Paste has a medium, pliable hold for various lengths of hair, adding texture and increased definition. Leaves hair with a matte finish and is water soluble for easy rinsing.

name: REUZEL MATTE TEXTURE POWDER
review: Reuzel Matte Texture Powder is a weightless, texturing powder that adds volume & thickness to hair and is suitable for all hair types.

name: Clean & Fresh Solid Face Wash Stick
review: Sulfate free facial solid cleanser stick intended to use on your dry face and neck.

name: Hydrating Face Moisturizer
review: Calming, hydrating facial moisturizer that works on all skin types. Helps boost antioxidant activity while brightening and moisturizing the skin.

name: Intensive Care Eye Cream
review: Quick drying, non-greasy eye cream. RR Intensive Care Eye Cream by REUZEL helps reduce the appearance of dark circles.

name: RR Fine Fragrance
review: A light and refreshing fine fragrance from REUZEL® with an uplifting, citrusy scent.

name: TAT – Buff Exfoliating Wash
review: Gentle – Exfoliating – Makes Colors Vibrant. Step #1 of TAT routine. BUFF is a strong and gentle natural cleanser loaded with fruit enzymes to rapidly exfoliate dead skin cells and surface debris from the skin.

name: TAT – Hydrabalm
review: Moisturizing – Brightening – Protective. Step #2 of your TAT routine. Deeply hydrating balm that helps brighten healed tattoo.

name: TAT – Shine Tattoo Spray
review: Absorbs Fast – Instant Color Pop – Non Greasy. BONUS Step! Add definition and radiance to your healed tattoo with this non greasy, quick dry formula.

name: TAT – Vivid Gel
review: Hydrating – Intensifying – Smoothing. Step #3 of your TAT routine. Hydrating gel that creates a moisture barrier on the skin while quickly enhancing the color of your tattoo.
